name: 蔡子萱
objective:
本課程主要講述化學原理及物質性質之專業知識，下學期部分著重於分析化學、溶液特性與基礎化學理論及觀念之介紹。包括：溶液性質、化學動力學、酸鹼平衡、緩衝溶液、沉澱反應、基礎配位化學、電化學以及其應用等。
This course focuses on the principles of chemistry and professional knowledge of material properties. During the second semester, the contents include the introduction of analytical chemistry, solutions, and basic chemical theories and concepts, such as solution properties, chemical kinetics, acid-base equilibrium, buffer solutions, precipitation reactions, coordination chemistry, electrochemistry, and their applications.
schedule:
第 1-2 週：Thermochemistry 
第 3-4 週：Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free Energy
第 5-6 週：Properties of Solutions
第 7-8 週：Chemical Equilibrium
第 9-10 週：Acid-Base Equilibria
第 11-12 週：Solubility and Complex Ion Equilibria 
第 13-14 週：Electrochemistry
第 15-16 週：Chemical Kinetics
第 17-18 週：Elements and Transition Metals
scorePolicy:
期中考 30-40%
期末考 30-40%
其他 (作業、出席率等) 20-40%
materials: Chemistry by Steven S. Zumdahl, Susan A. Zumdahl,   Donald J. DeCoste, 10/e, 2019
